en-US.title: UH Ulrich Professional Group
en-US.description: Affiliated with University Hospitals, UH Ulrich Professional Group ensures that all members of the family receive specialized medical care. They are dedicated to advancing the health and well-being of their patients and their families, particularly in the transgender community, with our board-certified physicians in family and internal medicine. They also provide vital resources such as health records management, test results, bill payment, and prescription refill requests through their patient portal.
